posts.post_content: Great card to use with [Nacatl War-Pride](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nacatl War-Pride). If you can give your own creatures Haste with something like [Fervor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fervor) or [Emblem of the Warmind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emblem of the Warmind) and then guarantee doing some damage ([Gruul War Plow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gruul War Plow) might do), you spark off an infinite loop of creatures attacking and multiplying exponentially as they do it. Impressive to see, although your opponent would never let it happen twice... =P
posts.html:
Great card to use with Nacatl War-Pride. If you can give your own creatures Haste with something like Fervor or Emblem of the Warmind and then guarantee doing some damage (Gruul War Plow might do), you spark off an infinite loop of creatures attacking and multiplying exponentially as they do it. Impressive to see, although your opponent would never let it happen twice... =P

posts.post_content:
Two creatures + [splinter twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=splinter twin) + anything that prevents blocking + this = infinite combat phase
  
1-Put this on the creature without spliner twin
  
2-Create the copy
  
3-Atack with the creature and the other one's copy token
  
4-Sac and move this to the copy
  
5-Create a new token and attack with both
  
6- 4,5,4,5,4,5,4,5,4,5,4,5...
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
All we need is an evasive creature with [CMC > 5](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=43533) that reanimates itself.  
  
Or [Nacatl War-Pride](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nacatl War-Pride) and some way to give your creatures haste (see [Concordant Crossroads](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Concordant Crossroads), [Fervor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fervor), [Mass Hysteria](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mass Hysteria), etc.) and make them unblockable without killing your opponents' creatures (see [Bedlam](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bedlam), [Falter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Falter), [Naya Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Naya Charm), [Cryptic Command](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cryptic Command), [Veiling Oddity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Veiling Oddity), [Sun Quan, Lord of Wu](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun Quan, Lord of Wu), etc).
posts.html:
All we need is an evasive creature with CMC > 5 that reanimates itself.

Or Nacatl War-Pride and some way to give your creatures haste (see Concordant Crossroads, Fervor, Mass Hysteria, etc.) and make them unblockable without killing your opponents' creatures (see Bedlam, Falter, Naya Charm, Cryptic Command, Veiling Oddity, Sun Quan, Lord of Wu, etc).
